title: Tamizhukku Amethendru Per Lyrics Panchavarna Kili
stanzas:
Tamizhukkum amuthendru paer
andha tamizh
inbath tamizh engal
uyirukku naer uyirukku naer (2)

Tamizhukku nilavendru paer
inbath Tamizh engal
samugathin vilaivukku neer

Tamizhukku manamendru paer
inbath tamizh engal
vazhvukku nirumitha oor

Tamizhukku madhuvendru paer
Tamizhukku madhuvendru paer
inbath tamizh engal
urimaichem payirukku vaer
payirukku vaer

Tamizhukkum amuthendru paer
andha tamizh inbathtamizh engal
uyirukku naer uyirukku naer

Tamizh engal illamaikku paal
Tamizh engal illamaikku paal
inbath tamizh nalla
pugazhmikka pulavarkku vael
pulavarkku vael

Tamizh engal uyarvukku vaan
inbath tamizh engal
asadhikku sudar thandha thaen
sudar thandha thaen

Tamizhukkum amuthendru paer
andha tamizh inbathtamizh engal
uyirukku naer uyirukku naer

Tamizh engal arivukku thoal
inbath tamizh engal
kavithaikku vairathin vaal
vairathin vaal

Tamizh engal piravikku thaai
inbath tamizh engal
valamikka ulamutra thee (2)

Tamizhukkum amuthendru paer
andha tamizh
inbath tamizh engal
uyirukku naer uyirukku naer
